Model

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.EnemyObject
        • Model.Boss

  • public class Boss
extends EnemyObject
    Boss object in Mats platform worlds, he moves around and shoots bullets at Mats trying to kill him The boss is killed when Mats his hitpoins run out
    Version:
    1.0 Build edited 12/5-18
    Author:
    Mathias Lundby, Jacob Larsen
